verbose_text: In addition, autophagy has been reported to deliver viral ligands to TLR7 in plasmacytoid DCs during vesicular stomatitis virus and Sendai virus infection and contribute to type 1 interferon production, which might be associated with lupus.
evidence: autophagy has been reported to deliver viral ligands to TLR7 in plasmacytoid DCs during vesicular stomatitis virus and Sendai virus infection and contribute to type 1 interferon production
